channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: How-To Use Graph Object Change Notifications
item.description: Hi, Jonas and Roland here! Or as we say in the north of Germany: "Moin Moin!" We recently worked on a mechanism to sync Entra ID group memberships into an Azure SQL table and would like to share our learnings. This article is part of a series of articles about Entra ID group membership synchronization. Check them out here: https://aka.ms/JonasOhmsenBlogs Introduction In this article we will dive deeper into “Option #4: Delta Notification” as described in our previous article: How-To Sync EntraID Group Memberships Into Any System TL/DR In short, we’ve built an Azure Function app to synchronize ...

item.title: Archiving Selective Microsoft Defender Logs to Azure Data Explorer
item.description: This blog builds upon the insightful Microsoft Community Hub article by Jeff Chin, Archive MDE Data to Event Hubs to ADX | Microsoft Community Hub. While the original guide thoroughly explains the process of forwarding Microsoft Defender for Endpoint (MDE) data into Azure Data Explorer (ADX) using Event Hubs, it overlooks a crucial real-world requirement: filtering and archiving logs from a selective subset of devices. In large enterprise environments, the sheer volume of Defender logs can be overwhelming and costly to retain. For instance, imagine an organization with 10,000 onboarded device...
